content.rendered:
2013 Ferrari 458 Spider  || ATPM
ODOMETER : 112KM || DELIVERY MILEAGE
ROSSO CORSA ON BEIGE INTERIOR

*Price : 6.425M*

Ferrari 458 Spider Engine Details
A seven-speed dual clutch automated-manual transmission helps regulate the 4.5L naturally aspirated V8 engine. The 458 Spider produces a stunning 562 hp at 9,000 rpm and 398 lb-ft of torque at 6,000 rpm while reaching a top speed of 199 mph, featuring the signature Ferrari soundtrack.

Viewing at Prestige Image Motorcars Showroom

  • Women
